meanings.definition: Covered with or consisting of scabs.
meanings.sent1: The dog's scabbier skin needed treatment.
meanings.sent2: Her scabbier knee healed slowly after the fall.
meanings.sent3: The scabbier surface of the old painting made it look like a patchwork quilt.
meanings.sent4: The scabbier appearance of the wall revealed years of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The scabbier texture of the rock felt rough to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The scabbier road made driving uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The scabbier fabric irritated her sensitive skin.
meanings.sent3: The scabbier table made the glass wobble comically.
meanings.sent4: The scabbier path through the forest was challenging to walk on.
meanings.sent5: The scabbier texture of the paper made it difficult to write on.
